rainfalls: As of today, there is no Heavy Rainfall Warning Issued.
thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Advisory No. 38 #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 7:08 PM, 01 July 2025(Tuesday)



Moderate to heavy rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are expected over Zambales and Bataan within the next 2 hours.



The above conditions are being experienced in Quezon(Panukulan), Tarlac(Tarlac City), Bulacan(Dona Remedios Trinidad, San Miguel), Nueva Ecija(Gapan, San Isidro, Cabiao) and Pampanga(Arayat) which may persist within 2 hours and may affect nearby areas.



All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides.



Keep monitoring for updates.
